episodes.title: Questioning the Watchtower
episodes.description:
This video attempts to explain why a 30 year veteran of the Jehovah's Witness faith decided to start questioning its authority and teachings. 
Jehovah's Witnesses, although generally sincere, are motivated by a misguided faith in the Watchtower Bible and Tract Society, and not God. 
The Watchtower places itself (under the guise of the "Faithful and Discreet Slave") as an authority figure between Man and God.
